lines.gurmukhi: cwr kuMt swq dIp mY n nv KMf ibKY dih ids dyKIAY n bn giH jwnIAY
lines.transliteration_english: Chaar Kount Saat Deep Mai N Nav Khand Bikhai , Dahi Dis Daykheeai N Ban Grih Jaaneeai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Glory of the union of True Guru and the devotees cannot be known or estimated in all the four directions, seven seas, in all the forests and nine regions.

lines.gurmukhi: log byd igAwn aunmwn kY n dyiKE suinE surg pieAwl miRq mMfl n mwnIAY
lines.transliteration_english: Log Bayd Giaan Ounamaan Kai N Daykhiao Souniao , Surag Paiaal Mrit Mandal N Maaneeai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: This grandeur has not been heard or read in wondrous knowledge of the Vedas. It is not believed to exist in heavens, nether regions nor in the worldly regions.

lines.gurmukhi: BUq Aau BivK n brqmwn cwro jug cqur brn Kt drs n iDAwnIAY
lines.transliteration_english: Bhoot Au Bhavikh N Baratamaan Chaaro Jouga , Chatur Baran Khat Daras N Dhiaaneeai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: It cannot be perceived in the four eons, three periods, four sections of the society and even in the six philosophical Scriptures.

lines.gurmukhi: gurisK sMgiq imlwp ko pRqwp jYsy qYso Aaur Taur sunIAY n pihcwnIAY ]197]
lines.transliteration_english: Gursikh Sangati Milaap Ko Prataap Jaisay , Taiso Aur Tthaur Souneeai N Pahichaaneeai ?197?

Shabad OS B.translation: The union of True Guru and his Sikhs is so indescribable and marvellous that such state is not heard or seen anywhere else. (197)
